page.title: 04Farming
page.content: There are around{43 farmers}here, each owning sevral sqare kilometres.A half of the land goes into grass and rough grazing, and the rest for hay, silage and potatoes.The major products are lamb,ewe mutton,and wool, but there are other sources too. The best land is nearly always near the house.Large area's of the land is not very good but it is useful for grazing the sheep.There are some cattle farmers but not many.It takes around{3 to 4 fields}of hay to keep the livstock going in the winter, so it is important to have good weather.The average intake of money a year is about{Â£10,000,but}this is not all profit.
